text:
@IsabelOakeshott You want teachers to die too?  Wow, you Tories are horrendous!

“At least 26 teachers have died from Covid-19.

Deaths involving coronavirus recorded for more than 60 educational staff in England and Wales, new data shows”.

https://t.co/6FMqSEw0zG

#schoolsreopening 
#Teachers
